# ColFormatGroupBy { #reactable.ColFormatGroupBy }

`ColFormatGroupBy(cell=None, aggregated=None)`

Specify formatters for standard and aggregate cells.

## Parameters

| Name         | Type              | Description                                     | Default   |
|--------------|-------------------|-------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| `cell`       | ColFormat \| None | Column formatting options for standard cells.   | `None`    |
| `aggregated` | ColFormat \| None | Column formatting options for aggregated cells. | `None`    |
